channel.title: CVE Feed for Projectworlds Pvt. Limited -- Online Food Ordering System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Projectworlds Pvt. Limited -- Online Food Ordering System

item.title: CVE-2023-45346|2024-09-12T19:38:06.224Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20food%20ordering%20system
item.description: Online Food Ordering System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The '*_role' parameter of the routers/user-router.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-45347|2024-09-12T19:37:16.684Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20food%20ordering%20system
item.description: Online Food Ordering System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The '*_verified' parameter of the routers/user-router.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-45345|2024-09-12T19:39:01.831Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20food%20ordering%20system
item.description: Online Food Ordering System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The '*_deleted' parameter of the routers/user-router.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-45338|2024-09-12T19:40:05.171Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- online%20food%20ordering%20system
item.description: Online Food Ordering System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'id' parameter of the routers/add-ticket.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.
